flyer1.Explanation: {{1}} ndiwokonzeka kulengeza kukhazikitsidwa kwa tsamba lathu latsopano. Zimaphatikizapo mndandanda wazinthu zomwe zikukula, monga:
flyer1.Notifications: Mukalowetsa imelo yanu kapena nambala yafoni mudzatha kulandira zidziwitso zofunika kudzera pa imelo kapena meseji.
flyer1.GetStarted: Kuti muyambe, mu msakatuli wanu chonde lowetsani mosamala :
